metadata.title: RA Family: Using Segger RTT with e2 lite / e2 emulator

sections.content:
Question:
Can I use Segger RTT with e2 lite / e2 emulator?
Answer:
Segger RTT only works with Segger JLink.
Suitable Products
RA
